<li>Players can no longer learn talents while dead. This resolves intermittent issues where such talents did not work as expected until the player relogged.</li>
<li>Effects from items such as <span style="color:#ffbf40">Runeblade</span> of <span style="color:#ffbf40">Baron Rivendare</span> now properly reapply after resurrection.</li>
<li><span style="color:#ffbf40">Totemic Slam</span> no longer triggers unintended effects, such as <span style="color:#ffbf40">Totem of the Corrupted Current</span>.</li>
<li>Fixed an issue where summoning the <span style="color:#ffbf40">Eye of Kilrogg</span> could cause the warlock‚Äôs pet to become lost.</li>
<li>Abilities and spells that scale with Attack Power now correctly include bonuses against specific creature types.</li>
<li>Fixed pathing issues near <span style="color:#ffbf40">Hearthglen</span>.</li>
<li>Fixed pathing issues in the outer areas of <span style="color:#ffbf40">Blackrock Depths</span>.</li>
<li><span style="color:#ffbf40">The Blazing Pan</span> has been slightly buffed to deal better damage than the easier‚Äëto‚Äëobtain <span style="color:#ffbf40">Half‚ÄëEaten Mutton Chop</span>.</li>
<li><span style="color:#ffbf40">Serena Bloodfeather</span> will now always drop loot.</li>
<li><span style="color:#ffbf40">Crossfaction Battlegrounds</span> will start to be active on our PvE realms. This means that you might get sorted into the opposing faction to fight for instead. We will first enable this on Warsong Gulch and enable the other Battlegrounds throughout the week.</li>

:::

::: {.notes}
En mindre Patch har kommit i veckan och det verkar som att du m√•ste ladda ned den med launchern. Om du inte anv√§nder launchern sedan innan b√∂r du kunna dra ig√•ng, ladda ner, och √•terg√• till det s√§tt du startar spelet.

Ut√∂ver cross faction PVP √§r det allm√§nna buggfixar denna veckan.
:::
